original_text: If our body was all the same part, it would not be a proper body.
korean_text: 만일 다 한 지체뿐이면 몸은 어디냐

sentences.original_text: If our body was all the same part
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 우리 몸이 모두 같은 부분이라면

sentences.original_text: it would not be a proper body
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 제대로 된 몸이 되지 않을 것입니다
